DataElement.preferredName: Reuse Template Study Activity Repeat Frequency Code ISO21090.CD.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded value specifying the number of occurrences of an activity within a given time period. EXAMPLE(S): BID = Two times per day, at unspecified times (does not necessarily imply that these are 12 hours apart); Q12H = Every twelve hours
